comment.author: 25738658@N05
comment._content: Photograph of Pearl Aufrere Actress See Nataional Portrait Gallery for some additional images. May have been a chorus girl in London who married well after an abortive engagement to Viscount Dangan. Considered a beauty of her time, many photographs on the web including some from post/cigarette cards.

comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Wow!  She's smoking!  That was quite scandalous for a young lady at that time.

comment.author: 92987904@N00
comment._content: Here's one of the cigarette card portraits from "British Beauties : a series of 76 hand coloured real photographs" [New York Public Library Digital Gallery]
